alert.note: Alert for Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 11:11PM CDT until April 28 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL STARR COUNTY... At 1111 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Salineno, or 7 miles northwest of Roma, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Roma, Escobares, La Rosita, Roma Creek, Fronton, Roma High School, Salineno, Falcon State Park, Los Alvarez and Garceno. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
